resources.string: Cuff-Less Blood Pressure & Heart Rate Monitoring System

At the main screen the real time graph of the data being received is shown and also the Heart Rate & Systolic and Diastolic Blood Pressure measurements are shown. To start the Monitoring System follow these steps:

1. Choose "Scan Device" Option from toolbar.

2. Once the text changes to "FOUND" press "START" button.

3. Use options in toolbar dropdown list to select which data you want to see ECG or PPG.
